block_comment: The block of code performs an imperative check on the timing of data queue input (dq_in) at index 11. It utilizes an always block to perpetually monitor changes in "dq_in[11]", and once a change is detected, it promptly calls the "dq_timing_check" function with "11" as an argument. This continuous cycle helps ensure the timing of "dq_in[11]" stays within acceptable bounds.
